text:
dubdub | Software Developer | Toronto, ON | REMOTE, INTERNS, VISA, https://dubdub.com/

At dubdub we are building and scaling a platform that brings every video-based story to life as simply as possible, eliminating the restraints of your mobile device. No lag. We are a high growth, fast paced, technology company focused on improving how social influencers create, distribute, and monetize video content.

We are looking for iOS, Android & full stack developers.

https://dubdub.com/careers/
